property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Protection Guaranteed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, he or she must either take 1 tag or suffer 2 meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We Never Sleep.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Expanding the Horizon

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to access a card in a remote server, the Runner must pay 1[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sic Itur Ad Astra.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Investing In Your Future

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you score an agenda, you may place 1 agenda counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Way Forward.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 3 agenda counters on Firmware Updates when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice that can be advanced. Use this ability only once per turn.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Glenn Station can host a single card. [Click]: Host a card from HQ facedown on Glenn Station. [Click]: Add a card on Glenn Station to HQ.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Gain 3[Credits]. Limit 1 Government Takeover per deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is essential to liberate a populace from tyranny before that tyranny takes root.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 1 agenda counter on High-Risk Investment when you score it. [Click], hosted agenda counter: Gain 1[Credits] for each credit in the Runner's credit pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trust me. I know what I'm doing."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may move an advancement token from an installed piece of ice to an installed piece of ice that can be advanced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With distributed systems, assets can be realigned with no loss of efficiency." -William Knuth, The Tower of Babbage

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you spend an agenda counter, gain 1[Credits]. [Trash] or any agenda counter: Gain 2[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a one-of-a-kind opportunityâ€¦"

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Gain 1 Credits for spending an agenda counter||[Trash]:Gain 2[Credits].||Any agenda counter: Gain 3 [Credits] (2 + 1 from trait).

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Space Camp is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Space Camp, you may place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Future leaders start here.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each agenda in the Runner's score area is worth 1 fewer agenda point. If the Board is trashed while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one on the board knows everyone on it.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Asteroid Belt can be advanced and its rez cost is lowered by 3 for each advancement token on it. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His belt of stone did shake and shatter.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wormhole can be advanced and its rez cost is lowered by 3 for each advancement token on it. [Subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on another piece of rezzed ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As through the door of light he came.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nebula can be advanced and its rez cost is lowered by 3 for each advancement token on it. [Subroutine] Trash 1 program.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He bent his bow of stellar matter.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Sentry-Code Gate-Barrier-Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orion can be advanced and its rez cost is lowered by 3 for each advancement token on it. [Subroutine] Trash 1 program. [Subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on another piece of rezzed ice. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And seeking prey he then took aim.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Move this piece of ice to the outermost position protecting any server. [Subroutine] Place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice protecting this server that can be advanced. [Subroutine] Place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice protecting this server that can be advanced.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Tracer-Illicit

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez Checkpoint, take 1 bad publicity. [Subroutine] Trace5 - If successful, do 3 meat damage when this run is successful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I passed right through one once. It didn't seem to do anything at first. It wasn't until I jacked out that I realized they were busting down the door of my apartment." -Valencia Estevez

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fire Wall can be advanced and gains +1 strength for each advancement token on it. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Definitely a literalist." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Searchlight can be advanced. X is the number of advancement tokens on Searchlight. [Subroutine]Tracex - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. [Subroutine]Tracex - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Current-Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The first time the Runner installs a card each turn, he or she must trash 1 card from his or her grip.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Patch on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition with the text "Host ice has +2 strength."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Update 1.1: -Fixes some stability issues. //maybe

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Black Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags. Do 2 meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Traffic was murder."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each piece of ice protecting this server is considered to have 1 additional advancement token on it. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Runner passes a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server, you can reveal and trash another copy of that ice from HQ to force the Runner to encounter the piece of ice just passed again.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anything worth doing is worth doing twice.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Sub Boost on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host ice gains barrier and '[Subroutine] End the run.' after all its other subroutines."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's fun watching them derez after hitting Enigma." -Grace Lamarr, Freelance Security Expert

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2[Recurring Credits] Use these credits to install ice protecting this server.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Cyberdex Virus Suite is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Cyberdex Virus Suite, you may purge virus counters. [Trash]: Purge virus counters.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Humanity's Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash the first operation you access each turn at no cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My only regret is that androids cannot feel my hate."

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Maximum Punk Rock

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, trash the top 2 cards of your stack. Draw 1 card.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: The Angel of Cayambe

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Corp starts the game with 1 bad publicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone deserves a chance. Everyone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [Click] [Click] [Click] and suffer 1 brain damage (cannot be prevented).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The human brain only uses like a quarter of its capacity anyway, right?" -MaxX

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 3 cards. Whenever I've Had Worse is trashed by taking net or meat damage, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp's maximum hand size is reduced by 1 for each bad publicity he or she has.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knows what they want–least of all them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on R&D. If successful, instead of accessing cards from the top of R&D, access cards from the bottom of R&D (starting with the bottom card and work your way up).

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards, you may spend any number of [Click] to force the Corp to trash an equal number of cards from HQ at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [Click] [Click] [Click]. Gain 10[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hello thank you for vidding MegaBuy I'm Carol how can I help you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. The first time you break all subroutines on a sentry during this run, trash that sentry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. The first time you break all subroutines on a barrier during this run, trash that barrier.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. The first time you break all subroutines on a code gate during this run, trash that code gate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1[Credits]: Break ice subroutine. You cannot access more than 0 cards for the remainder of this run. 1[Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nom nom nom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an installed Corp card is trashed, place 1 virus counter on Gravedigger. [Click], hosted virus counter: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once your sniffer finds the protocols the server uses to trash its own data, you can spoof those same protocols. It's quite the show." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 1 virus counter on Hivemind when it is installed. Virus counters on Hivemind are considered to be hosted on all other virus programs for the purposes of card effects (and can be spent as if on them).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We built the network. But then the network evolved. Can we be sure that it is not alive?" -g00ru

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may host a single virus program on Progenitor. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. Whenever virus counters are purged, remove all but 1 virus counter from the hosted card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you access cards in Archives, remove 1 card in Archives from the game, instead of accessing it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A black box that makes data disappear forever.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may trash another of your installed cards. If you do, draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was a sickly smell coming from his closet. He hoped it was only a mouse this time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +3[Memory Unit] Use the MU on MemStrips only for virus programs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trick is remembering which virus you loaded onto which strip. That's why I draw emoji on 'em. Then I just have to remember which emoji stands for which virus." -Princess Space Kitten

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1[Memory Unit] When your turn begins, draw 1 card if the Corp has cards in HQ equal to his or her maximum hand size. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show me your faith without deeds, if you can."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain credits equal to the agenda points on that agenda.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They showed me that I wasn't broken. I am still a whole human, no matter how many limbs I lose. The golems are our enemy, as well as anyone who values efficiency and profit more than a human life." -Edward Kim

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity. [Click],[Click],[Click],[Click],[Trash]: Give the Corp 1 bad publicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her heart beat faster as her reader illuminated the records. It was all there. The pod had not been reprogrammed since the 14th, which meant that this was a case of gross negligence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: Prevent all damage. Trash all installed hardware, all installed non-virtual resources, and all cards in your grip. Lose all credits in your credit pool. Remove all tags.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, me. You won't have to vertical park." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, if there are 2 or more power counters on Stim Dealer, remove all power counters from it and suffer 1 brain damage (cannot be prevented); otherwise, place 1 power counter on Stim Dealer and gain [Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her eyes were the color of dreams and disasters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground. [Click]: Move 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground to another card with at least 1 virus counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scraps of code drifting around the network can congeal into pools of data. Within this primordial soup the code breaks, re-assemble, mutates. Evolves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add an installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Runner software is notoriously scratch-built and under-tested, and the shadow net has no tech support. It works, mostly, but sometimes a fresh install is just the ticket.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may lose [Click]. If you do, avoid the first tag you would take until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, gain 1[Credits] if you have 2 or more unused MU.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I like to make origami cranes out of old newsrag. It helps me think, putting it back on the subconscious. I figure it's the same principle for my rig – keep it busy and it makes me a few creds for my trouble." -Quetzal
